qualities.name: Return on Investment
qualities.description: The interest is the Return on Investment (ROI) [%] between the initial investment cost and the net life cycle earnings.

qualities.name: Life Cycle earnings
qualities.description: The life cycle earnings is the total earnings of its income over the life cycle of the building.

qualities.name: Life Time
qualities.description: The lifetime is the total expected lifespan of the building, expressed in years.

qualities.name: Income per Year
qualities.description: The income per year is the total income generated by the building per year.

qualities.name: Initial Investment
qualities.description: The initial investment is the total cost to construct the building.

qualities.name: Building Construction Costs
qualities.description: The total cost of the building construction.

qualities.name: Technical Equipment Costs
qualities.description: The total cost of the technical equipment needed for the building.

qualities.name: Life Cycle Costs
qualities.description: The total cost during the life cycle of the building.

qualities.name: Operating Costs
qualities.description: The total operating costs during the life cycle of the building.

qualities.name: Operating Expenses
qualities.description: The operating expenses during one year.

qualities.name: Maintenance Expenses
qualities.description: The maintenance expenses during one year.

qualities.name: Energy Expenses
qualities.description: The energy expenses during one year.

qualities.name: Heating Expenses
qualities.description: The heating expenses over a year.

qualities.name: Electricity Expenses
qualities.description: The electricity expenses over a year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Expenses
qualities.description: The ventilation expenses over a year.

qualities.name: Heating Costs
qualities.description: The heating costs are the product of the final heating energy demand and heating energy price over a year.

qualities.name: Final Heating Energy Demand
qualities.description: The final heating energy demand is the heating energy demand multiplied with the heating efficiency factor of one year.

qualities.name: Heating Efficiency Factor
qualities.description: The efficiency factor for the heating system.

qualities.name: Heating Energy Demand
qualities.description: The energy demand for heating the building per year.

qualities.name: Heating Load
qualities.description: The maximum heating power required to maintain comfort conditions.

qualities.name: Cooling Load
qualities.description: The maximum cooling power required to maintain comfort conditions.

qualities.name: Transmission Heat Loss
qualities.description: The heat loss due to transmission through the building envelope per year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Heat Loss
qualities.description: The heat loss due to ventilation in the building over a year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Heat Loss Factor
qualities.description: The factor representing the proportion of heat lost through ventilation.

qualities.name: Ventilation Heat Recovery Factor
qualities.description: The factor representing the proportion of heat recovered from ventilation.

qualities.name: Heating Energy Price
qualities.description: The price per unit of heating energy.

qualities.name: Heating CO2 Price
qualities.description: The heating CO2 price is the product of heating global warming potential and CO2 price per year.

qualities.name: CO2 Price
qualities.description: The price per unit of CO2 emissions.

qualities.name: Electricity Costs
qualities.description: The electricity costs are the product of the electricity energy demand and electricity energy price for one year.

qualities.name: Electricity Energy Demand
qualities.description: The energy demand for electricity in the building per year.

qualities.name: Technical Equipment Energy Demand
qualities.description: The energy demand of the technical equipment in the building for one year.

qualities.name: Electricity Energy Price
qualities.description: The price per unit of electricity energy.

qualities.name: Electricity CO2 Price
qualities.description: The electricity CO2 price is the product of electricity global warming potential and CO2 price per year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Costs
qualities.description: The ventilation costs are the product of final ventilation energy demand and electricity energy price per year.

qualities.name: Final Ventilation Energy Demand
qualities.description: The final ventilation energy demand is the product of ventilation efficiency factor and ventilation energy demand for one year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Efficiency Factor
qualities.description: The efficiency factor for the ventilation system.

qualities.name: Ventilation Energy Demand
qualities.description: The energy demand for ventilation in the building over a year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Electricity Demand
qualities.description: The electricity demand for ventilation in the building over a year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Air Flow Volume
qualities.description: The volume of air flow required for ventilation per hour.

qualities.name: Ventilation CO2 Price
qualities.description: The CO2 price for ventilation are the costs associated with the carbon emissions from the ventilation system, which is the electricity-CO2-Price because the ventilation system runs with electricity.

qualities.name: Final Energy Demand
qualities.description: The final energy demand is the total energy demand of the building per year, including all energy carriers.

qualities.name: Primary Energy Demand
qualities.description: The primary energy demand is the total primary energy demand of the building per year, including all energy carriers.

qualities.name: Primary Heating Energy Demand
qualities.description: The primary heating energy demand is the product of final heating energy demand and heating primary energy factor for one year.

qualities.name: Heating Primary Energy Factor
qualities.description: The primary energy factor for the heating system.

qualities.name: Primary Electricity Energy Demand
qualities.description: The primary electricity energy demand is the product of electricity energy demand and electricity primary energy factor for one year.

qualities.name: Electricity Primary Energy Factor
qualities.description: The primary energy factor for electricity.

qualities.name: Primary Ventilation Energy Demand
qualities.description: The primary ventilation energy demand is the product of final ventilation energy demand and electricity primary energy factor for one year.

qualities.name: Floor Area
qualities.description: The total floor area of the building.

qualities.name: Effective Floor Area
qualities.description: The effective usable floor area of the building.

qualities.name: Area Efficiency
qualities.description: The ratio of effective floor area to total floor area.

qualities.name: Specific Heating Energy Demand
qualities.description: The heating energy demand per effective floor area over a year.

qualities.name: Specific Final Energy Demand
qualities.description: The final energy demand per unit effective floor area.

qualities.name: Specific Primary Energy Demand
qualities.description: The primary energy demand per unit effective floor area.

qualities.name: Specific Initial Investment
qualities.description: The initial investment cost per unit effective floor area.

qualities.name: Specific Life Cycle Costs
qualities.description: The life cycle costs per unit effective floor area.

qualities.name: Specific Life Cycle Global Warming Potential
qualities.description: The life cycle global warming potential per unit effective floor area.

qualities.name: Specific Construction Global Warming Potential
qualities.description: The construction global warming potential per unit effective floor area.

qualities.name: Users
qualities.description: The number of people who use the building, including residents and workers.

qualities.name: Area Comfort
qualities.description: The effective floor area per user.

qualities.name: Initial Costs per User
qualities.description: The initial investment cost per user.

qualities.name: Life Cycle Cost per User
qualities.description: The life cycle costs per user.

qualities.name: Construction GWP per User
qualities.description: The construction global warming potential per user.

qualities.name: Primary Energy Demand per User
qualities.description: The primary energy demand per user.

qualities.name: Final Energy Demand per User
qualities.description: The final energy demand per user.

qualities.name: Heating Energy Demand per User
qualities.description: The heating energy demand per user.

qualities.name: Specific Ventilation Energy Demand
qualities.description: The ventilation energy demand per unit effective floor area.

qualities.name: Ventilation Energy Demand per User
qualities.description: The ventilation energy demand per user.

qualities.name: Life Cycle GWP per User
qualities.description: The life cycle global warming potential per user.
